name: Notorious B.I.G
quote: If the game shakes me or break me, I hope it makes me a better man.
Stay far from timid, only make moves when your heart's in it.
Don't let them hold you down, reach for the stars.

name: Greg Universe
quote: If every pork chop was perfect we wouldn't have hot dogs
Son, there will come a time in your life when you learn to accept all pizza.
I didn't drop out of community college for nothing.

name: Malcolm X
quote: A man who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
A wise man can play the part of a clown, but a clown can't play the part of a wise man.
There is no better than adversity. Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance next time.
